column5: CT is having a promo today (saturday march 5) where you will receive a 10$ gift card if you spend 40$ or more. With this in mind I took a trip to my local cdn tire to get myself a new fin bore 3 auger. I went with a printout of lebarons catalogue since the price is much lower and received the following discounts Cdn tire regular price 120$ Lebaron price 94.94$ Cdn tire 10% price match money back 9.50$ Cdn tire promo card 10$ Total came to 108$ ish with about 20$ worth of cdn tire play money back  All in all it seemed like a decent deal, but just as a heads up the promo card expires in a week, so don't sit on it for to long.  Get on this promo quickly because it is a one day only thing, its also good if you want one of those ctek chargers everyone raves about.
Dont ya just hate it when that happens
Never buy anything at CTC unless it on sale!!!I speak from experience!!!
Good price, is that for the 8"? I'm not to concerned though, as I said I paid 108 and got 20 back even though it is in cdn tire credit (88 total tax included). And does the 85 include tax?
Ya got a good deal dude !!! If you said it cost ya 5.99, someone woulda found it cheaper

Thanks mercman  I'm not a big cdn tire fan myself but if you have a printout of the add from peters tackle, and do a pricematch today, you will get one hell of a deal. I mean in total, I saved close to 50$ off the total cdn tire price. I was just trying to give people a heads up on what I think was a decent price. Besides most posters complain about the prices at CT but with the fact that they are willing to meet, then beat the competitors price makes me think that not a lot of folks actually take advantage of it here.
Which CT location? Any more 6' left?

Bought a Duramaxx 32/30 trolling motor today for $101.62 after tax. That is with a raincheque from last sale price ($99.99), $10.00 off, and my 10% employee discount. Finally paid off to work there haha!  Just kidding, it's not that bad
i only saw one more 8" fin on the shelf no other sizes, there were a few swed bores though. oh, and i picked it up at the eglington and caledonia location
ctek charger is 40% off:  ctek charger
Those augers are awsome. It's the only auger I've seen that can do this! 3 mins.  edit: mine has the curved blades...maybe not the same model.
